rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports statistics using neutral language ('over 700 cases... have been recorded').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual information (global human cases) but contains no explicit calming cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports statistics/facts, not capabilities or preparedness.
